name: I'm safe!
description:
You're a small bird in a world full of birds. Listen carefully, find your way through tangled places and find out if birds are stronger together.

A small game with emphasis on audio and visuals made in 5 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 with theme "Stronger together".

Controlled with mouse motion only.

Alt+F4 to quit.

Please play with sound it's a crucial part of gameplay.
